sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function NearbyDonors({ user }) { const [donors, setDonors] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [searchFilters, setSearchFilters] = useState({ bloodType: '', distance: '10', availability: 'all' }); useEffect(() => { fetchNearbyDonors(); }, [searchFilters]); const fetchNearbyDonors = async () => { try { const queryParams = new URLSearchParams({ location: user.location, ...searchFilters }).toString(); const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/nearby-donors?${queryParams}`); if (response.ok) { const data = await response.json(); setDonors(data); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching nearby donors:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (

🩸 {donor.totalDonations || 0} donations
⭐ {donor.rating || 5.0} rating ({donor.reviews || 0} reviews)
📅 Last active: {donor.lastActive || '2 days ago'}
{donor.specialties && donor.specialties.length > 0 && (
{donor.specialties.map((specialty, index) => ( {specialty} ))}
)} {donor.bio && (

{donor.bio}

)}
)) )}

); } export default NearbyDonors;
